heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 9 | 2 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: These regions are characterized by interior drainage and ephemeral streams. [10] Name these regions, where one can find playas and dunes. An example of a cold one is Antarctica, and they are formally defined as regions that receive less than 10 inches of rainfall per year.
